definitions.definition: To take out of service or to render unusable .
examples: They decommissioned the ship after the accident.
The Army decommissioned the Sherman tank by filling the turret with cement.

definitions.definition: To remove or revoke a commission .
examples: After his arrest, the officer was decommissioned from the police force.

definitions.definition: To remove or revoke a formal designation .
examples: The state highway was decommissioned and reverted to local control.

main_definition: To take out of service or to render unusable .
secondary_definitions: To remove or revoke a commission .
To remove or revoke a formal designation .
